snippet: Officials with the Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network voted in an emergency meeting to create a new avenue for children seeking lung transplants.
abstract: Officials with national Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network vote in emergency meeting to create new avenue for children seeking lung transplants after two families file lawsuits challenging rule.

byline.contributor: Denise Grady contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Officials with the Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network voted in an emergency meeting to create a new avenue for children seeking lung transplants.

headline.seo: Vote Aids Children Under 12 Seeking Lung Transplant
headline.main: Vote Allows Children Under 12 Seeking Lung Transplant to Have Case Reviewed
headline.print_headline: Vote Allows Children Under 12 Seeking Lung Transplant to Have Case Reviewed
